Module.Name: Bus_Sonar10
Module.Overview: The Bus_Sonar10 can drive up to 10 HC-SR04's.

Register.Name: LED
Register.Description: This register controls the on-board LED.

Register.Name: Encoder1
Register.Description: This register is associated with the first encoder.

Register.Name: Encoder2
Register.Description: This register is associated with the second encoder.

Function.Name: Encoders_Reset
Function.Description: This function will reset both encoders to zero.

Function.Name: encoders_latch
Function.Brief: Cause both encoder values to be latched.
Function.Description: This function will cause the encoder values to be latched. The next time either the encoder1 or encoder2 register is accessed, the latched value is returned. After that non- latched values are returned.

Register.Name: Motor1
Register.Description: This register is specifies the motor1 speed.

Register.Name: Motor2
Register.Description: This register is specifis the motor2 speed.

Register.Name: Motor1_Reverse
Register.Description: This register causes motor 1 to go in the opposite direct direction when given a positive value.

Register.Name: Motor2_Reverse
Register.Description: This register causes motor 2 to go in the opposite direct direction when given a positive value.

Register.Name: Encoder1_Reverse
Register.Description: This register causes encoder 1 to go in the opposite direction.

Register.Name: Encoder2_Reverse
Register.Description: This register causes encoder 2 to go in the opposite direction.

Register.Name: Motors_Encoders_Swap
Register.Description: This register causes the motors and encoders to be swapped.

Register.Name: PID_Proportional
Register.Brief: Kp proportional constant numerator for PID algorithm.
Register.Description: This register specifies a signed 16-bit numerator that when divided by a the common demomitator is used by the PID algorithm as the Kp proportional constant.

Register.Name: PID_Integral
Register.Brief: Ki integral constant numerator for PID algorithm.
Register.Description: This register specifies a signed 16-bit numerator that when divided by a the common demomitator is used by the PID algorithm as the Ki integral constant.

Register.Name: PID_Derivative
Register.Brief: Kd derivative constant numerator for PID algorithm.
Register.Description: This register specifies a signed 16-bit numerator that when divided by a the common demomitator is used by the PID algorithm as the Kd derivative constant.

Register.Name: PID_Denominator
Register.Brief: Common deonominator for the PID constants.
Register.Description: This register specifies a signed 16-bit denominator that is used to divide the Kp, Ki, and Kd numerators.

Register.Name: PID_Active
Register.Description: This register is set to *True* to enable the PID algorithm.
